name: Kick the Billy
description:
Kick the Billy is a dani fangame about the character billy from his game karlson. Oh, you dont know what Karlson is? It’s just a little game Dani is working on which is currently the 13th most whishlisted game on steam, so make sure to smash wishlist now GAMERS!!

In this game you can bully and hit billy just like in the real Karlson. It dosent contain any ads or in-game-purchases for the best experience. All the Items, maps and skins in the game are Dani references, for example: Milk, Orange juice, drill and UNITYS PARTICLE SYSTEM.

E - open sidebar, R - Reset game, Esc - open menu
